titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Republic of Congo
Republic of Congo

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no official legislation governing the access to diplomatic records.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives: Rue Eugène Etienne, BP 114, Brazzaville.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact the nearest Republic of Congo Embassy or the Republic of Congo’s permanent mission to the United Nations with a letter of introduction to inquire about the feasibility of any research.

p.ref: Permanent Mission to the United Nations
